column4: Hi. I've been having a weird problem for quite some time, I just now have time to investigate it... Occasionally, fonts in Firefox render partiall cut off.  You can see it in the lowercase u's in this screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/M2ej1.png  Anyone know whats going on?
with luck, you may only have a corrupted font file
if it was a corrupted font file, it wouldn't still happen on a new install. And it only happens sometimes.
you are probably right... it's beginning to sound like a bad video card
